sentences.en: Analytical solutions for three dimensional elasticity problems are quite difficult to obtain.
sentences.cn: 三维弹性问题的解析解是很难得到的.

sentences.en: Complementary goods have a negative cross elasticity of demand.
sentences.cn: 互补商品的需求的交叉弹性为负数.

sentences.en: Daily facial exercises help her to retain the skin's elasticity.
sentences.cn: 每天做面部运动帮助她保持皮肤弹性。

sentences.en: Elasticity, solubility, inflammability are paradigm cases of dispositions in natural objects.
sentences.cn: 伸缩性 、 可缩性 、 易燃性是天然物体倾向性的范例.

sentences.en: Every sort of spring has a definite elasticity.
sentences.cn: 每一种弹簧都有一定的弹性.

sentences.en: Fig . 8 . 29 shows the effect on the solution of including elasticity and enhanced viscosity.
sentences.cn: 图8.29表示考虑弹性变形及粘度提高对计算结果的影响.

sentences.en: Gluten develops elasticity in a dough.
The amount of force for which the laws of elasticity is valid depends on the material.
sentences.cn: 弹性定律成立,力的数值要有一定范围,它取决于材料的性质.

sentences.en: The elasticity of demand for a single newspaper is bound to be higher than the figure for newspapers as a whole.
sentences.cn: 某一份报纸需求量的伸缩性肯定大于报业整体需求的伸缩性。

sentences.en: The elasticity of his heart had been crushed out of him by early sorrows.
sentences.cn: 过去的一件件伤心事已经弄得他意志消沉.

sentences.en: The plane problems and the torsion problem are standard fare in solution oriented books on elasticity.
sentences.cn: 平面问题和扭转问题是弹性问题解法书中的标准内容.

sentences.en: The skin eventually loses its elasticity.
The toughness, lightness, strength, and elasticity of whalebone gave it a wide variety of uses.
sentences.cn: 鲸须既韧又轻，而且强度和弹性大，这些特点使其用途广泛。

sentences.en: Unitary elasticity is the coincidental case that is just on the borderline between elastic and inelastic.
sentences.cn: 关于单弹性是一种巧合.这种巧合是有弹性和缺乏弹性的分界线.

sentences.en: We will not be concerned with the development of a general theory of finite elasticity.
sentences.cn: 我们不去关心有限应变弹性学的一般理论的导出.

words.tran_cn: 有弹性的；灵活的；易伸缩的
[生化] 弹性蛋白酶；胰肽酶E
[力] 弹性体，[高分子] 高弹体
使（纤维）具有弹性（elasticize的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: the ability of something to stretch and go back to its usual length or size
